mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.changpian_order_uuid_number as changpianOrderUuidNumber ,a.address_id as addressId ,a.changpian_id as changpianId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.buy_number as buyNumber ,a.changpian_order_courier_number as changpianOrderCourierNumber ,a.changpian_order_courier_name as changpianOrderCourierName ,a.changpian_order_true_price as changpianOrderTruePrice ,a.changpian_order_types as changpianOrderTypes ,a.changpian_order_payment_types as changpianOrderPaymentTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
